# delegate

**Instance Property**

The delegate of the request object.

## Declaration

```swift
weak var delegate: (any SKRequestDelegate)? { get set }
```

## Discussion

The delegate must adopt the [doc://com.apple.storekit/documentation/StoreKit/SKRequestDelegate] protocol, although most subclasses of [doc://com.apple.storekit/documentation/StoreKit/SKRequest] provide a more specific protocol to implement.

## Accessing the Delegate

- **SKRequestDelegate**: Common methods that are implemented by delegates for any subclass of the `SKRequest` abstract class.
